design_philosophy.vibe: Think 'High-End Swiss Watch' meets 'Modern Fintech'. Dark, mysterious, but illuminated by warm gold light. Not the aggressive red/green of Wall Street, but the sophisticated amber/teal of a private family office.

usage_rules.headings: Use Playfair Display for all H1-H3. It adds the 'Luxury' touch. Keep weights lighter (400/600) rather than bold.
usage_rules.body: Use Manrope for all UI text. It is geometric but friendly.
usage_rules.numbers: ALWAYS use JetBrains Mono for prices, percentages, and tabular data.

layout_strategy.spacing: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for cards. Gap-6 for grids.

buttons.primary: bg-gradient-to-r from-[#D4AF37] to-[#AA8C2C] text-[#0F1115] font-bold hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(212,175,55,0.4)] transition-all duration-300 rounded-full px-8 py-3
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-[#D4AF37]/30 text-[#D4AF37] hover:bg-[#D4AF37]/10 transition-all duration-300 rounded-full px-8 py-3

cards.base: bg-[#161920]/60 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/5 rounded-xl p-6 hover:border-[#D4AF37]/30 transition-all duration-300 group relative overflow-hidden
cards.highlight: before:absolute before:inset-0 before:bg-gradient-to-b before:from-[#D4AF37]/5 before:to-transparent before:opacity-0 hover:before:opacity-100 transition-opacity

inputs.base: bg-[#0F1115] border border-white/10 focus:border-[#D4AF37] focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#D4AF37] rounded-lg text-white placeholder:text-slate-600

library_preference.line_area: recharts (Use for sparklines and simple trends)

hero_bg.usage: Background overlay with low opacity (10-20%) to add texture to the dark background.

trader_lifestyle.usage: Landing page 'Join the Elite' section. Use with a gradient fade-out.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. UPDATE TAILWIND CONFIG: Add the new colors (obsidian, gold, etc.) and font families defined above.
2. UPDATE INDEX.CSS: Import the Google Fonts (Playfair Display, Manrope). Set the root variables to the new dark/gold palette.
3. LANDING PAGE: Build a 'Hero' section using the Abstract Gold Wave image as a subtle background. Use Playfair Display for the main headline: 'Trading, Elevated to an Art Form'.
4. DASHBOARD: Implement a 'Bento Grid' layout. The main chart (Lightweight Charts) should take 60% of the screen. Signal cards should be on the right.
5. SIGNALS: Use 'Gold' for the active/highlight state. Use muted Sea Green for Buy and muted Rose for Sell. Avoid neon colors.
6. PRO FEATURES: Create a 'Strategy Selector' using a glassmorphic tab system. Show 'Best Pairs' in a clean data table with JetBrains Mono numbers.
7. ANIMATIONS: Use 'animate-fade-in' and 'animate-slide-up' for entrance. Add a subtle 'pulse-gold' animation to the live signal indicators.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text unless it is a very large headline.
Ensure all interactive elements have a hover state that involves a color shift or glow.
Keep the UI 'breathing'. Do not clutter. Use negative space as a luxury element.
